articles.author: Sarah Anne Aarup
articles.title: Moldova says it thwarted Russia-linked plot ahead of anti-government protests - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The arrests come soon after the US warned that Moscow is trying to ‘weaken the Moldovan government.’
articles.content:
The Moldovan police said on Sunday that they arrested a group of men with ties to Russia who were scheming to whip up unrest at anti-government protests in Moldova.
The arrests come just a few days … [+1565 chars]
